Well, we are doing 2 things with heritrix...

The first thing is to read a =
priority listed database of URL's and 
seed heritrix with them. The thought=
 of wrapping heritrix inside of 
another program has been tossed around in =
order to run scheduled or 
recurring crawls on specific URL's.

We will the=
n use a custom writer processor to pickout 
new, "Interesting" URL's and al=
so any malware we find.

New URL's will be stored back into the same databa=
se, and any malware 
will be stored into a different database.

Hope this c=
lears things up a little bit,
The Earthlinkers

ogroups.com, Paul Jack <pjack@...> wrote:
